welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Neu Isenburg! Known for its rich history and picturesque scenery, this city is sure to capture your heart. We invite you to explore and experience all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, serving most international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, primarily serving Lufthansa and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, currently under construction and set to open in 2023.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium high-speed WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, handling all air freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
